thread.title: Ground News - Safety concerns rise after 3 generations in one family killed in Johnson County crash
thread.title_full: Ground News - Safety concerns rise after 3 generations in one family killed in Johnson County crash

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Safety concerns rise after 3 generations in one family killed in Johnson County crash
text:
Summary by Ground News A pickup truck and minivan collided head-on near County Road 1119 and U.S. Highway 67. Six people died and three others were seriously hurt. Five of the six killed were members of the same family. Residents who use this road daily say more needs to be done to prevent serious crashes. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
KRDO Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: News-Press & Gazette Company Safety concerns rise after 3 generations in one family killed in Johnson County crash By OLIVIA LEACH Click here for updates on this story GLEN ROSE, Texas (KTVT) — People in parts of North Texas are expressing concerns for their safety, after a deadly wreck on a busy highway this week. That crash happened Tuesday afternoon in Johnson County when a pickup truck and minivan collided head-on near County Road 1119 and U.S. Highway 67. Six people died and three others were seriously hurt. Five of the six killed were members of t…
